titleStmt.title: A godly ballad of the just man Job vvherein his great patienc[e ... d]oth declare, his plagues, and his miseries, and yet did not dispar[e.] The tune is, the merchant.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for F. Coles, J. VVright, Tho, Vere, and VV. Gilbertson,

notesStmt.note: Publication date conjectured by Wing, which estimates it as 1655-1658.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
